description:
THIS IS A NEW WAY BALL-SHOOTING-GAME OF YEAR 2017 FEATURED BY APPLE

*Over 6,000,000 downloads! See why so many people are addicted to Attack Balls!*

*** SUPPORTS ALL DEVICES INCLUDING IPHONE 7 PLUS ***

1. Benefits
- endless number of game levels
- iOS 10.0 Compatible

2. How to play

3. How to win
Destroy all the balls on the game board
